alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 05 at 6:01PM CDT until September 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA AND EAST CENTRAL CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 601 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northwestern Oklahoma City, or near The Village, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Western Oklahoma City, Yukon, Bethany, Warr Acres, The Village, Nichols Hills, and Woodlawn Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
